titles.title: Waiving points of order against the conference report to accompany the bill (H.R. 4101) making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1999, and for other purposes.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 105-764, by Mr. Solomon.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 4101 with 1 hour of general debate. Previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motions. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. H.Res. 551, the rule on H.R. 4618, is tabled.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 264.

action.text: The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 10/2/1998--Introduced. Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 4101 (Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies programs appropriations).
